mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.fk_into_cust_ref_id , t1.validate_state , t1.create_time , t1.modify_time , t1.create_by , t1.modify_by , t1.status , t1.ext1 , t1.ext2 , t1.attach_number , t1.ordertypecode , t1.ordertypename from car_loan_back_info t1 where t1.fk_into_cust_ref_id = #{orderId} and t1.ordertypecode=#{ordertypecode}
mapper.update: update car_loan_back_info t1 set t1.fk_into_cust_ref_id =#{dto.fkIntoCustRefId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.validate_state ='1', t1.create_time =#{dto.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.modify_time =#{dto.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.create_by =#{dto.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_by =#{dto.modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.status =#{dto.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.ext1 =#{dto.ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.ext2 =#{dto.ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attach_number =#{dto.attachNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.ordertypecode =#{dto.ordertypecode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.ordertypename =#{dto.ordertypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
update car_loan_back_info t1 set t1.valid='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
